We understand that parents and students are feeling anxious as they look for clear communication on how institutions are handling and responding to the pandemic. This anxiety is compounded for graduating seniors and their parents as the milestone of high school graduation quickly approaches. Therefore we are seeking your input as the EPSS weighs possible alternatives in the event graduation can't be held as scheduled. EPSS must abide by CDC guidelines and restrictions, but we want to honor each senior's milestone achievement. ~Superintendent Darwan Lazard
